message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"son; male child","sentence":"爸爸有一个儿子。","image_prompt":"A warm, soft apocalypse animation style illustration showing a father with his little son standing together. The father and son are simply dressed, standing outside a modest house. The background has fading, dreamy colors with suggestive signs of an apocalyptic world—muted skies, worn buildings—but the mood is gentle and affectionate, focusing on their loving relationship.","sentence_translation":"Dad has a son."}
